title: "RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time" occured
body_html:
In calling torch.nn.init.orthogonal, the error like below has occurred.

  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 328, in orthogonal
    orthogonal(tensor.data, gain=gain)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 342, in orthogonal
    q, r = torch.qr(flattened)
RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time
 at /workspace/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THLapack.c:237

I googled and checked it, but most of what I got was about torch7, not PyTorch. I also checked #199, and tried installing OpenBLAS and then PyTorch again, but it didn't work.
What is the problem? Any help would be appreciated.

What is the problem? Any help would be appreciated.
body:
In calling `torch.nn.init.orthogonal`, the error like below has occurred.
```
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 328, in orthogonal
    orthogonal(tensor.data, gain=gain)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 342, in orthogonal
    q, r = torch.qr(flattened)
RuntimeError: geqrf: Lapack library not found in compile time
 at /workspace/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THLapack.c:237
```
I googled and checked it, but most of what I got was about torch7, not PyTorch. I also checked #199, and tried installing OpenBLAS and then PyTorch again, but it didn't work.
What is the problem? Any help would be appreciated.
